overall.description: Trim the leading and/or trailing zeros from a 1-D array or sequence.

trim.description: A string with ‘f’ representing trim from front and ‘b’ to trim from back. Default is ‘fb’, trim zeros from both front and back of the array.

trimmed.description: The result of trimming the input. The input data type is preserved.

note: The input data type is preserved, list/tuple in means list/tuple out. '
